snippet: The New Jersey State Police said that none of the helicopter flights that carried Gov. Chris Christie during the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge flew anywhere near the bridge or Fort Lee, N.J.
abstract: New Jersey State Police say that none of the helicopter flights that carried Gov Chris Christie during the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge in September flew anywhere near the bridge or Fort Lee, NJ.
lead_paragraph: The New Jersey State Police said that none of the helicopter flights that carried Gov. Chris Christie during the lane closings at the George Washington Bridge flew anywhere near the bridge or Fort Lee, N.J.

headline.main: Police Say Christie Copter Didn’t Fly Over Bridge
headline.print_headline: Police Say Christie Copter Didn’t Fly Over Bridge
